name: Big 5 Manzini
description:
[8:16 pm, 26/12/2025] Mahomy: Business type = Cross-Border Deceased Transportation Services
[8:17 pm, 26/12/2025] Mahomy: Core Services

International transportation of deceased persons

Regional (SADC) and global repatriation

Coordination with airlines & cargo services

Coffin and zinc lining arrangements (where required)

Documentation coordination (death certificate, permit guidance)

Airport handling & clearance

Liaison with embassies and consulates

Collection from hospitals or mortuaries

Delivery to destination funeral home or family
[8:17 pm, 26/12/2025] Mahomy: Optional / Future Services

Local funeral transport (within South Africa)

Funeral coordination support

Cold storage & mortuary partnerships

Insurance & funeral policy partnerships
[8:19 pm, 26/12/2025] Mahomy: About Us

Big 5 Manzini is a South Africaâ€“based repatriation and deceased transport service company dedicated to providing dignified, professional, and compassionate transportation of deceased persons across borders.

We specialize in coordinating international and regional transport solutions while supporting families during difficult moments with sensitivity, efficiency, and respect.

Our Mission

To provide respectful, reliable, and seamless deceased transportation services that honor cultural traditions and meet international logistical standards.

Our Vision

To become a trusted repatriation partner across Africa and globally by delivering ethical, compliant, and efficient funeral logistics services.

Our Values

Dignity & Respect

Professionalism

Compassion

Cultural Sensitivity

Reliability

Services Offered

International deceased repatriation

Cross-border transport services

Airline and cargo coordination

Documentation assistance guidance

Mortuary and funeral home liaison

Airport clearance and handling

Collection and delivery services

Why Choose Big 5 Manzini

Reliable South African base

Understanding of African and international customs

Compassionate client handling

Strong partner coordination

Efficient turnaround times

Target Clients

Families & next of kin

Funeral homes

Embassies and consulates

Insurance companies

NGOs and international organizations

Operating Model

Big 5 Manzini works with licensed mortuaries, funeral homes, airlines, and regulatory bodies to ensure all transport processes meet required standards while maintaining dignity and compliance.
